ticket.title: ActiveRecord 'where' clause doesn't resolve table_name_prefix for associations...
ticket.original-body: The 'where' clause doesn't use table_name_prefix for associations. 'joins' does this properly, however 'where' does not. This makes it impossible to do something like User.joins(:favorite_colors).where(:favorite_colors => {:color => "red"}) if :favorite_colors is in a namespace or if a prefix is specified for a specific model.
